text: Mauren is a city of Liechtenstein. It has a population of 3,700 as of 2008. 2008 Statistics for Liechtenstein ==History== It was first called "Muron" in 1178. It has a memorial to the Liechtenstein educator and historian Peter Kaiser (1793 â€“ 1864). ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website *Liechtenstein Portal Category:Cities in Liechtenstein Category:Municipalities of Liechtenstein Category:12th-century establishments in Europe Category:1170s establishments
